events.description: No malicious activity detected. Network traffic is normal.
A DDoS attack was detected. Source IP 192.168.0.1 launched a DDoS attack targeting IP 10.0.0.100.
events.mitigationActions: Activated rate limiting on the firewall to block malicious traffic.

events.description: An SQL Injection attack was detected. Source IP 10.1.1.1 attempted to exploit a vulnerability in the application.
events.mitigationActions: Patched the application and strengthened input validation.

events.description: A phishing attack was detected. Source IP 192.168.0.10 sent a fraudulent email attempting to obtain sensitive information.
events.mitigationActions: Implemented email filtering rules and user awareness training.

events.description: A brute force attack was detected. Source IP 192.168.0.20 attempted to guess the login credentials of the target.
events.mitigationActions: Implemented account lockout policy and strong password requirements.

events.description: A cross-site scripting attack was detected. Source IP 10.3.3.3 injected malicious scripts into the target web page.
events.mitigationActions: Implemented output encoding and input validation on the web application.

events.description: A malware attack was detected. Source IP 192.168.0.30 attempted to infect the target system with a malicious file.
events.mitigationActions: Isolated the infected system and performed a malware scan.

events.description: A password cracking attempt was detected. Source IP 192.168.0.50 tried to guess the login credentials of the target.
events.mitigationActions: Implemented account lockout policy and strong password requirements.

events.description: A cross-site scripting attack was detected. Source IP 10.6.6.6 injected malicious scripts into the target web page.
events.mitigationActions: Implemented output encoding and input validation on the web application.

events.description: A malware attack was detected. Source IP 192.168.0.60 attempted to infect the target system with a malicious file.
events.mitigationActions: Isolated the infected system and performed a malware scan.

events.description: A Man-in-the-Middle attack was detected. Source IP 10.5.5.5 intercepted the communication between two systems.
events.mitigationActions: Implemented SSL/TLS encryption and certificate pinning to prevent MITM attacks.
